products.title: Story Oak
products.body_html:
STORY is the world’s first levitating timepiece allowing you to personalize your most unique journeys. STORY consists of a magnetically levitating sphere that orbits around a wooden base telling the time. 

The base contains a backlit display that illuminates through the wooden surface, giving it a seamless look and finish.

For extended features, connect STORY to the cloud for using our mobile app and illuminate realtime data thorough STORY’s backlit display.

Features

STORY is more than just a clock: it’s a unique way to visualize time.

  • Journey mode

A new home, a new member in the family, a marathon, or plans to travel the world, STORY allows you to create your own personal timeline.

  • Clock mode

Watch time being counted in a surprising way: a gravity-defying clock. The floating chrome sphere represents the hour, telling the time as it levitates around its wooden base.

  • Timer mode

STORY works for your short term daily activities as well. A 1 hour meeting at the office? Let STORY count it for you.

  • LED Matrix

Displays numerical time illuminating through the surface of the wood. 

  • Backlit Display

Illuminate real-time meteorological data, such as moon phases. RGB / Warm White LED display customizable via the FLYTE app.

  • Multiple orientations

The magnetic sphere can levitate horizontally, vertically or at a 60-degree angle with included stand and mounting kit.

Learn more about all features

Mobile app

For extended features, connect STORY to our mobile app


Technical description

Includes Oak base, chrome sphere, AC Adapter.

Base Diameter: 265mm (10.4”)
Base Height: 56 mm (2.2”)
Chrome Sphere Diameter: 16mm (0.6”) 
Textile cable length: 2m (78”)
Base Weight: 1.4kg (3.09)
AC Adapter: Input 100-240V - 50/60Hz;
Output 15V 1A (Global voltage compatible)

Product video
How to

A step-by-step guide on how to levitate your STORY sphere

Eager for more STORY tips? We have a dedicated platform just for STORY! 
Look here for our expanded STORY help page.

products.title: Refurbished Unit
products.body_html:
Flyte refurbished model is a 100% Flyte original that has been reworked and thoroughly tested to make sure it is fully functional and works as new. 

We like to think that each Flyte is unique, as it floats in the air in its own way. These are the Flytes that have been levitating in displays of museums such as MoMA in New York, been with us in M&O in Paris, NY Now in New York, Lisbon Fashion Week and other exciting events and exhibitions.

Learn more

Visual Details

The functionality of a refurbished Flyte unit is the same as it is for a new Flyte. Our Flytes are guaranteed to levitate no matter what. Refurbished units might have a small imperfection here or there, but never in a way that compromises the overall aesthetic look of the unit.

Learn more

 

Technical Details 

Includes magnetic base, lightbulb and AC Adapter.

No batteries required.

Lifetime: 50 000 Hours
Efficiency: 16Lm/W
Max Brightness: 60 Lumens
Power Adapter: 15 Volts 
US/EU/UK /AU Plug
Global Voltage Compatible: 100 - 240V

Usage: Indoor Use Only
Weight of Base: 500 grams / 1.10 Pounds
Base Dimensions: 126mm x 126mm x 30mm ( 5 in. x 5 in. x 1.2 in.)

Product video

How to

Levitation requires a bit of practice, so don't get frustrated if it takes several attempts to learn how to set it up.

With the right technique, setting up your FLYTE can take as little as a few seconds. Now that's magic!

products.title: Apparel
products.body_html:
Whether you're a creator who strives for authenticity, an engineer in search of innovation, or simply a FLYTE fan, we believe that these items will boost your creative projects and serve as a daily reminder that everything is possible.

Delivery

When will I receive my order?
It takes 2-7 days to fulfill an order, after which it’s shipped out.
The shipping time depends on  your location, but typical shipping times are:  

USA: 3- 4 business days  
International: 5-15 business days

What do I need to know about ordering internationally?

Shipments outside of the USA may incur customs fees depending on the destination country. The fee may vary depending on your order value, country limits, and other factors based on the product itself. End recipient is responsible for these fees.

We highly recommend including your phone number in the order when ordering internationally - this will minimize the risk of an order being lost in transit and make delivery of the order smoother.

T-Shirt details & sizing

Soft and lightweight, with the right amount of stretch.

• 100% combed and ring-spun cotton (Heather colors contain polyester)

• Ash color is 99% combed and ring-spun cotton, 1% polyester

• Heather colors are 52% combed and ring-spun cotton, 48% polyester

• Athletic and Black Heather are 90% combed and ring-spun cotton, 10% polyester

• Heather Prism colors are 99% combed and ring-spun cotton, 1% polyester

• Fabric weight: 4.2 oz (142 g/m2)

• Pre-shrunk fabric

• Side-seamed construction

• Shoulder-to-shoulder taping

At this time, we don't offer exchanges. If you’re unsure which size would fit better, check out our  sizing charts—we have one for every item listed on our store, in the product description section.

Tote bag details

Say goodbye to plastic, and bag your goodies in this organic cotton tote bag.

• 100% certified organic cotton 3/1 twill

• Fabric weight: 8 oz/yd² (272 g/m²)

• Dimensions: 16″ × 14 ½″ × 5″ (40.6 cm × 35.6 cm × 12.7 cm)

• Weight limit: 30 lbs (13.6 kg)

• 1″ (2.5 cm) wide dual straps, 24.5″ (62.2 cm) length

• Open main compartment

Cap details

This camper style cap has a low profile and nylon strap clip closure. Comfortable and classic!

• 100% cotton

• Soft-structured

• Five panel

• Low profile

• Metal eyelets

• Nylon strap clip closure

Returns & Refunds

What’s your return policy?

We don’t offer returns and exchanges, but if there’s something wrong with your order, please let  us know by contacting us at info@flyte.se! 

Do you offer refunds?

Refunds are only offered to customers that receive the wrong items or damaged items. If any of  these apply, please contact us at info@flyte.se with photos of wrong/damaged  items, and we’ll sort that out for you.

products.body_html: Py: The Levitating Pyramid by Flyte

products.title: Flyte Manhattan
products.body_html:
Levitating light bulb inspired by New York City's monochrome skyline, Manhattan features an Edison style borosilicate glass bulb, a 7 LED star-shaped filament, a Chrome cap and an aluminum ring. The base is crafted from a sustainably-sourced Walnut wood.

FLYTE Manhattan uses an energy efficient LED rated to last about 50,000 hours. That’s equivalent to 12 hours a day for 11 years! FLYTE Manhattan is designed in Sweden. 

Flyte Walnut / Chrome Cap   

Includes Walnut base, lightbulb with Chrome cap and AC Adapter.

No batteries required. 

Technical Details 

Lifetime: 50 000 Hours
Power consumption: Max 15W, Typical <3W
Brightness: 6 Lm
Power Adapter: 15 Volts 
US Plug
Global Voltage Compatible: 100 - 240V

Usage: Indoor Use Only.
Weight of Base: 500 grams / 1.10 Pounds.
Base Dimensions: 126mm x 126mm x 30mm ( 5 in. x 5 in. x 1.2 in.)

products.title: Buda Ball
products.body_html:
Buda Ball is a magnetically levitating sphere that hovers in mid-air. Designed to lower our stress levels, Buda Ball floats and rotates hypnotically in an invisible magnetic field, creating a soothing, time-stopping visual experience: a reminder to live in the present moment.

Important care instructions

Keep your Buda Ball sphere apart from any metals, magnets and other Buda Ball spheres to avoid injuries and visual damage of the sphere. 

Pre-order information

Expected shipping in February 2022.

Technical details

Buda Ball Dimensions:

Length: 110mm / 4.3 inches, 
Width: 110mm / 4.3 inches, 
Height: 23mm / 0.9 inches

Sphere: 20mm / 0.70 inches diameter

Product video

 How to

FLYTE Nikola uses an energy efficient LED rated to last about 50,000 hours. That’s equivalent to 12 hours of usage a day for 11 years!
FLYTE Nikola is designed in Sweden.    
Technical Details

No batteries required.

Technical description

Base Diameter: 265mm (10.4”)
Base Height: 56 mm (2.2”)

Product video
How to

Carefully cut and remove the top and the bottom plastic tie wrap before plugging in your Story.

Remove the cover sticker and plug in your Story cord.

Plug the Story adapter into an electricity outlet. 
Now you’re ready to Set time free!

A step-by-step guide on how to levitate your STORY sphere

Eager for more STORY tips? We have a dedicated platform just for STORY! 
Look here for our expanded STORY help page.

featured_image.alt: Levitating light bulb Inspired by New York City's monochrome skyline, Manhattan features an Edison style borosilicate glass bulb, a 7 LED star-shaped filament, a Chrome cap and an aluminum ring. The base is crafted from a sustainably-sourced Walnut wood.

Levitating light bulb FLYTE Buckminster, named after the visionary American inventor Buckminster Fuller (and also the name of the designer's cat!), features an Edison style borosilicate glass bulb, a 7 LED star-shaped filament, a Copper cap and an aluminum ring. The base is crafted from a sustainably-sourced Walnut wood.

Levitating light bulb FLYTE Royal is our Oak edition and one of our best sellers. Royal features an Edison style borosilicate glass bulb, a 7 LED star-shaped filament, a Gold cap and an aluminum ring. The base is crafted from a sustainably-sourced Oak wood.
